revised_title: Clifford Dobell's Life and Legacy in the Study of Antony van Leeuwenhoek
tldr: The article discusses the life and work of Clifford Dobell, a leading protozoologist who dedicated 25 years of part-time study to the biography of Antony van Leeuwenhoek, the "father of the microscope." Dobell's work on Leeuwenhoek's life and achievements is considered a milestone in the history of biology, showcasing his passion for microbiological artwork and his dedication to the field.
